name: The Fool
description: A young man standing at the edge of a cliff, symbolizing new beginnings and a willingness to take risks.

name: The Magician
description: A figure with a raised wand, representing skill, knowledge, and power.

name: The High Priestess
description: A woman seated between two pillars, symbolizing intuition, insight, and wisdom.

name: The Empress
description: A regal figure surrounded by lush greenery, representing fertility, abundance, and nurturing energy.

name: The Emperor
description: A powerful figure seated on a throne, symbolizing structure, authority, and leadership.

name: The Hierophant
description: A figure seated in a temple, representing tradition, conformity, and spiritual guidance.

name: The Lovers
description: Two figures embracing, symbolizing relationships, choices, and commitment.

name: The Chariot
description: A charioteer riding a chariot pulled by two sphinxes, representing willpower, control, and determination.

name: Strength
description: A figure gently taming a lion, symbolizing inner strength, courage, and self-control.

name: The Hermit
description: A figure holding a lantern and standing alone on a mountain peak, representing introspection, wisdom, and guidance.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: A wheel with various symbols and figures, representing the cycle of life, fate, and change.

name: Justice
description: A figure holding a scale and a sword, representing balance, fairness, and accountability.

name: The Hanged Man
description: A figure hanging upside down from a tree, representing sacrifice, perspective, and new beginnings.

name: Death
description: A figure riding a horse and holding a scythe, representing transformation, change, and rebirth.

name: Temperance
description: A figure pouring water from one vessel to another, representing balance, harmony, and moderation.

name: The Devil
description: A figure with horns and a tail, representing temptation, materialism, and addiction.

name: The Tower
description: A tower struck by lightning, representing upheaval, chaos, and sudden change.

name: The Star
description: A figure pouring water from a jug, surrounded by stars, representing hope, renewal, and positive energy.

name: The Moon
description: A figure standing on a rocky shore, surrounded by a moonlit sky, representing intuition, dreams, and mystery.

name: The Sun
description: A smiling figure standing in a sunlit field, representing joy, success, and enlightenment.

name: Judgment
description: A figure rising from the dead, representing rebirth, renewal, and self-awareness.

name: The World
description: A figure dancing in a circle, surrounded by symbols of the four elements, representing completion, integration, and wholeness.
